Platform.Title: Institute of Food Research Salmonella typhimurium LT2 6k array
Platform.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. LT2
Platform.Manufacturer: Institute of Food Research, Norwich, UK
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: PCR product array of whole ORF's from S. Typhimurium LT2. For description of PCR amplification and printing procedures see Clements et al., (2002) PNAS 99(13): 8784-8789.

Column.Name: GENE SYMBOL
Column.Description: Common name of gene

Column.Name: SPOT ID
Column.Description: STM number

Column.Name: GB ACC
Column.Description: GenBank accession number

Column.Name: GB RANGE
Column.Description: Position of ORF

Column.Name: GENE_PRODUCT
Column.Description: Function of gene product

Platform.Title: Institute of Food Research Salmonella typhimurium LT2 5.8K array
Platform.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. LT2
Platform.Manufacturer: Institute of Food Research, Norwich, UK
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: PCR product array of whole ORF's from S. Typhimurium LT2. For description of PCR amplification and printing procedures see Eriksson et al., Molecular Microbiology(2003) 47(1): 103-118.

Column.Name: GENE SYMBOL
Column.Description: Common name of gene

Column.Name: GENE_PRODUCT
Column.Description: Function of gene product

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: STM number

Sample.Title: S. Typhimurium relAspoT LB high salt low oxygen rep 1

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. SL1344
Channel.Characteristics: RNA labelled with Cy5-dCTP and laser scanned at 635nm with background subtracted from feature signal
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: RNA labelled during reverse transcription into cDNA with Cy5-dCTP according to protocol at http://www.ifr.ac.uk/safety/Microarrays/protocols.html
Channel.Growth-Protocol: S. Typhimurium SL1344 deleted for relAspoT genes and grown to OD600 = 0.348 in Lennox Broth containing 0.3M NaCl in low-oxygen conditions.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA isolation protocol at http://www.ifr.ac.uk/safety/Microarrays/protocols.html
Channel.Label: Cy5-dCTP

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium
Channel.Characteristics: Genomic DNA labelled with Cy3-dCTP and laser scanned at 532nm with background subtracted from feature signal
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Genomic DNA labelled with Cy3-dCTP according to protocol at http://www.ifr.ac.uk/safety/Microarrays/protocols.html
Channel.Growth-Protocol: S. Typhimurium grown to stationary phase
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Genomic DNA isolated using the Qiagen 'Genomic DNA' Kit (Cat. No.: 19060 for the buffer kit; 10243 for the columns)
Channel.Label: Cy3-dCTP
Channel.Label-Protocol: Channel Label Protocol: Labelling protocol at http://www.ifr.ac.uk/safety/Microarrays/default.html#protocols

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Slides blocked with DCE according to protocol at PMID 11266573. For hybridisation and washing protocols see http://www.ifr.ac.uk/safety/Microarrays/default.html#protocols
Sample.Description: Intensity ratios of RNA (channel 1) divided by DNA (channel 2) signals minus respective background signals. Total array is 16 blocks arranged in 4X4 configuration.
Sample.Data-Processing: Data centring was performed by bringing the median ratio (Cy5/Cy3) for each of the 16 blocks to one using the following equation: (Ti) = (Cy5i/Cy3i) - c, where T is the centred ratio, i is the gene index, Cy5 and Cy3 are the red and green intensities and c is the 50th percentile of all Cy5/Cy3 ratios. Flagged features are omitted from the data centring process.

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Log base 10 of ratio F635 Median-B635 divided by F532 Median-B532

Column.Name: F635 Median - B635
Column.Description: Feature signal (labelled RNA) minus background signal

Column.Name: F532 Median - B532
Column.Description: Feature signal (labelled DNA) minus background signal

Column.Name: RatioRNA/DNA
Column.Description: Ratio F635 Median-B635 (labelled RNA) divided by F532 Median-B532 (labelled DNA)

Column.Name: Flags
Column.Description: Not found, empty or bad features

Sample.Description: Intensity ratios of RNA (channel 1) divided by DNA (channel 2) signals minus respective local background signals. Total array is 16 blocks arranged in 4X4 configuration
Sample.Data-Processing: Data centring was performed by bringing the median ratio (Cy5/Cy3) for each of the 16 blocks to one using the following equation: (Ti) = (Cy5i/Cy3i) - c, where T is the centred ratio, i is the gene index, Cy5 and Cy3 are the red and green intensities and c is the 50th percentile of all Cy5/Cy3 ratios. Channel.Extract-Protocol: Genomic DNA isolated using the Qiagen 'Genomic DNA' Kit (Cat. No.: 19060 for the buffer kit; 10243 for the columns)
Channel.Label: Cy3-dCTP

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Slides blocked with DCE according to protocol at PMID 11266573. For hybridisation and washing protocols see http://www.ifr.ac.uk/safety/Microarrays/default.html#protocols
Sample.Description: Intensity ratios of RNA (channel 1) divided by DNA (channel 2) signals minus respective local background signals. Total array is 16 blocks arranged in 4X4 configuration
Sample.Data-Processing: Data centring was performed by bringing the median ratio (Cy5/Cy3) for each of the 16 blocks to one using the following equation: (Ti) = (Cy5i/Cy3i) - c, where T is the centred ratio, i is the gene index, Cy5 and Cy3 are the red and green intensities and c is the 50th percentile of all Cy5/Cy3 ratios. Flagged features are omitted from the data centring process.

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Log base 10 of ratio F635 Median-B635 divided by F532 Median-B532

Column.Name: F635 Median - B635
Column.Description: Feature signal (labelled RNA) minus background signal

Column.Name: F532 Median - B532
Column.Description: Feature signal (labelled DNA) minus background signal

Column.Name: Ratio RNA/DNA
Column.Description: Ratio F635 Median-B635 divided by F532 Median-B532

Column.Name: Flags
Column.Description: Not found, empty or bad features

Series.Title: Effect of ppGpp on Salmonella Typhimurium gene expression
Series.Summary: The expression profile of an S. Typhimurium mutant strain unable to synthesise ppGpp (relAspoT deletions) was compared to the wild-type strain. The effect of ppGpp on virulence gene expression was studied under 4 different growth conditions that induce virulence gene expression. Keywords: genetic modification
Series.Overall-Design: Study comprised 4 separate experiments (with 2 strains and 4 replicates for each strain per growth condition). The experiments were indirect comparisons using Salmonella genomic DNA as the comparator which also acted as the control for spot quality.
